Question: NEC Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NEC Corporation

Face & Facial Parts Monitoring System

- Uses accurate face recognition technology for mobile devices to analyze face patterns and pupil conditions, estimating vitals and mental states
- Non-contact analysis through smartphone camera takes just 10 to 60 seconds for easy and convenient monitoring
- Expected release in fiscal 2024 or later
- Recognized with an "Honoree" award in the Artificial Intelligence (AI) category at CES 2024
- Solution aligns with the growing interest in personal wellness and wearable devices for health monitoring
- Developed by NEC Corporation, a leader in IT and network technologies aiming to promote a brighter world through innovation and integration of technology
- Solution aims to provide non-invasive and convenient health monitoring for users via their mobile devices
Summary_cn:
NEC公司

面部及面部部位监测系统

- 使用准确的面部识别技术，分析移动设备上的面部模式和瞳孔状况，估计健康状况和精神状态
- 通过智能手机摄像头进行非接触分析，只需10至60秒即可进行简单方便的监测
- 预计于2024财年或之后发布
- 在2024年CES展览会的人工智能（AI）类别中荣获“荣誉”奖
- 该解决方案符合对个人健康和可穿戴设备进行健康监测日益增长的兴趣
- 由NEC公司开发，NEC公司是IT和网络技术领域的领导者，旨在通过创新和技术整合推动一个更美好的世界
- 该解决方案旨在为用户提供通过移动设备进行无创和便捷的健康监测
